Title: We're Building!/Garden Fun
Plot:
This episode of Network Wiggles has skits that involve gardening and a couple of songs featuring the purple Wiggle, Jeff!  Dorothy visits a preschool, Captain Feathersword predicts a fluttering of butterflies, and the mascots play soccer.

Song List:
"Wake up, Jeff!"
"Where's Jeff?"
"Gulp Gulp"
"Hot Potato"
"Let's make some rosy tea"
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
